overview: Inside a Lithuanian synagogue, young Domas Darguzs regales the filmmaker with a whispered, wide-eyed account of mythical events, while the film cross-cuts to images of a goat farm. Kid brother of a Isreali soldier, Domasâ€™ stories are part fantasy, part hopeful ruminations of a courageous, young mind interrupted only by an impatient adult.
title: 9 minutes of Kaunaus
